description.@en: By consecrating a grave with holy water, you protect a grave against trespass or theft.

data.distance: Any one grave you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Invoking the wrong name of the deceased, you awaken them from their slumber – but only in your mind’s eye. Their voices haunt your dreams and you must succeed at a Resolve Test now and every morning for six days or be subjected to Fear.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the robbers suffer a -30 Base Chance instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, a grave you touch imbues a terrible curse upon those who attempt to rob or desecrate it. Anyone who attempts either suffers a -20 Base Chance to all Brawn, Agility and Perception-related Skills, until they return any items which were stolen and the grave is restored to the condition before they despoiled it.

reagents.@en: A vial of holy water, sprinkled on a burial site (expended)
